maqras.text: 14|28|Nandao ni meiyou kanjian na deng ren ma? Tamen dui an la wang en fu yi, bing shi ziji de zongzu xianyu miewang zhi jing——
14|29|huo yu zhi zhong. Tamen jiang jinru huo yu, na guisu zhen zaogao,
14|30|tamen wei an la shuli xuduo pidi, yibian tamen shi ren beili zhu de dadao. Ni shuo:“Nimen xiangshou ba, yinwei nimen bi guiyu huo yu!”

14|31|Ni yao dui wo di naxie xindao de puren shuo: Rang tamen jin shou bai gong, bingqie zai na ji wu maimai you wu youyi zhi ri lailin yiqian, mimi de he gongkai di fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de caiwu.

14|32|An la chuangzao tiandi, bing cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, er jie yushui shengchan ge zhong guoshi, zuowei nimen de jiyang; ta wei nimen zhifu chuanbo, yibian tamen feng ta de mingling er hangxing haizhong; ta wei nimen zhifu heliu;
14|33|ta wei nimen zhifu ri yue, shi qi jingchang yunxing, ta wei nimen zhifu zhouye.
14|34|Nimen dui zhu de yaoqiu, ta dui nimen dou you suo shangci. Ruguo nimen jisuan an la de enhui, nimen buneng jiayi tongji. Ren que shi bu yi de, que shi wang en fu yi de.
14|35|Dangshi, yi bo la xin shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi zhege difang bian cheng anquan de, qiu ni shi wo he wo de zisun, yuanli ouxiang chongbai.
14|36|Wo de zhu a! Ouxiangmen que yi shi xuduo ren mi wu. Shei shuncong wo, ta que shi wo de tong jiao; shei weikang wo, name, ni shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.

14|37|Women de zhu a! Wo que yi shi wo de bufen houyi zhu zai yige meiyou zhuangjia de shangu li, zhu zai ni de jin fang fujin——women de zhu a!——Yibian tamen jin shou bai gong, qiu ni shi yibufen ren de xin yilian tamen, qiu ni yi yibufen guoshi gongji tamen, yibian tamen ganxie
14|38|women de zhu a! Ni biding zhidao women suo yinhui de he women suo biaobai de. Tiandi jian meiyou she me shiwu neng manguo an la.
14|39|Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Ta zai wo laomai de shihou, shangci wo yi sima yi he yi si ha ge. Wo de zhu que shi tingqu qidao de.
14|40|Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo he yibufen houyi jin shou bai gong. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni jieshou wo de qidao.
14|41|Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zai qingsuan zhi ri raoshu wo he wo de shuangqin he xinshimen.”
14|42|Ni jue buyao yiwei an la hu shi bu yi zhe de xingwei, ta zhi dui tamen huanxing dao dengyan de rizi,
14|43|(zai na ri), tamen jiang taizhe tou wang qian benzou, tamen de yanjing bu gan kan ziji, tamen de xin shi kongxu de.

14|44|Ni yingdang jinggao zhongren, jianglai yao you zheyang de yi ri, xingfa jiang lailin tamen, er bu yi zhe jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni rang women yanchi dao yige linjin de dingqi, yibian women xiangying ni de haozhao, shuncong ni de shizhe.” Nandao nimen yiqian meiyou fashi shuo, nimen jue bu hui miewang ma?
14|45|Nimen ceng juzhu zai zi kui zhe suo zhu di difang, erqie mingbai wo shi zenyang chuzhi tamen de. Wo ye wei nimen dale xuduo bifang.
14|46|Tamen que yi yong jimou, zai an la nali, you tamen de jimou (de guobao). Jishi tamen de jimou neng yidong qun shan.
14|47|Ni jue buyao yiwei an la dui ta de shizhe shuangyue. An la que shi qiangda de, que shi cheng e de.
14|48|Zai na ri, zhe dadi yao bian cheng bie de dadi, zhu tian ye yao bian cheng bie de zhu tian, tamen yao chulai jian du yi de, quanneng de an la.
14|49|Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian zui renmen daizhe zhigu, cheng shuang cheng dui di bei kunbang qilai;
14|50|tamen de chenyi shi yong liqing zuo de, huo jiang longzhao tamen de lian.
14|51|Yibian an la yiju ge ren suo xing de shan e er jiayi baochou. An la que shi qingsuan shensu de.
14|52|Zhe shi dui zhongren de chongfen de biaoshi, yibian tamen yinci er shou jinggao, yibian tamen zhidao ta zhishi du yi de bei chongbai zhe, yibian you lizhi de ren jiqu jiaohui.
